chs: 扔东西/丢东西/丢垃圾/扔垃圾
note_chs: 根据不同动作情况有不同用法。
note_en: Depending on the situation an action can have different uses.

chs: 不服输/明知错不认/爱面子
en: The dead chicken forcing thelid of the rice pot open
note_chs: 歇后语不服输；明知自己错了，但为了面子都要装没事、不认错，给人看穿了都不认。
note_en: (ldiom) (V) To refuse toadmit one's mistake evenwhen it is obvious
variants_chs: 形容词 通常特指人的行为
variants_en: Adjectives usually refer specifically to human behavior.
